channel.title: MoparClassic compatibility for "CodeForFame/Client"
channel.description:
Forked "CodeForFame/Client" with the goal of making it work with the current MoparscapeClassic the way that xetr0v/mpc-client does. This is basically the RSCA client.
Changes so far: [url=https://github.com/Marwolf/Client/commit/12eefd44f03d11484c1d0e8f882832b387075ce9]https://github.com/Marwolf/Client/commit/12eefd44f03d11484c1d0e8f882832b387075ce9[/url]
I copied the pubKey and copied in the password hashing to match what is in the xertr0v/mpc0-client but the following error occurs on the MoparClassic GS:
[code] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 Connection from: 127.0.0.1 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 Login exception with: 127.0.0.1 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 1952805773 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at java.lang.String.checkBounds(String.java:375) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at java.lang.String.<init>(String.java:535) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.connection.Packet.readString(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.phandler.client.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.core.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.core.GameEngine.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
(username test, password test)
What else am I missing? I like the way that this client is set up with the cache in that format for landscape and sprite content creation.

item.title: MoparClassic compatibility for "CodeForFame/Client"
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Forked “CodeForFame/Client” with the goal of making it work with the current MoparscapeClassic the way that xetr0v/mpc-client does. This is basically the RSCA client.

Changes so far:
https://github.com/Marwolf/Client/commit/12eefd44f03d11484c1d0e8f882832b387075ce9

I copied the pubKey and copied in the password hashing to match what is in the xertr0v/mpc0-client but the following error occurs on the MoparClassic GS:

[java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 Connection from: 127.0.0.1 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 Login exception with: 127.0.0.1 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 1952805773 [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at java.lang.String.checkBounds(String.java:375) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at java.lang.String.<init>(String.java:535) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.connection.Packet.readString(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.phandler.client.PlayerLogin.handlePacket(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.core.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(Unknown Source) [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 [java] [java] 2014.12.06 19:41:57 at org.moparscape.msc.gs.core.GameEngine.run(Unknown Source)

(username test, password test)

What else am I missing? I like the way that this client is set up with the cache in that format for landscape and sprite content creation.
